name: Astesice, Kairi
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to two of your rear-guards, and return them to your hand.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you persona rode this turn, choose up to two cards from your hand, and call them to (RC) in different rows.
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Astesice, Kiyora
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, choose one of your rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand.
[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit is boosted, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Astesice, Nanami
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), you may choose a grade 1 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC) as [Rest].
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Astesice, Mion
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Earnest Wish, Hanael
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Munching Girl, Seeya
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and call it to an open (RC) or put it into your hand. If you put it into your hand, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn!
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Astesice, Misa
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Knowledge as Power, Saskia
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Habitual Truant, Pelageya
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!

name: Astesice, Kanami
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
productName: [VGE-D-LTD01] Lyrical Trial Deck 01: Ahoy! Lyrical Monasterio!
